<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ferocious Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4734) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Untamed Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4713)

</column>

---

You've mastered the shape of dinosaurs. Add the shapes listed in [_dinosaur form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1489) to your untamed form list. Whenever you use untamed form to take a shape that grants you a specific Athletics modifier, you gain a +1 status bonus to your Athletics checks.
name: Ferocious Shape
